title: Institutions Are Collapsing, But Here’s The Good News (Ep 1598)
description:
A left wing outlet published an explosive piece on the mask tyranny going on. In this episode, I address the article along with the continued implosion of the Biden agenda as their credibility craters. 

News Picks:

Disgusting USA Today “fact-checker” smears Gold Star families.

The costs of wearing a face mask are real.

Where are all of these missing ballots? 

Yes, the counter culture revolution has begun. 

Amazon doubles down on speech suppression.


We MUST build a parallel economy.
